description: The ORTHO_TREAT_NOTE table contains information about orthodontics treatment note.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the treatment plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NOTE
columns.description: Printable comments for the treatment plan.
